org.springframework.context

接口 EnvironmentAware

  • 所有超级接口:
    Aware
    所有已知实现类:
    AbstractRequestLoggingFilter, CharacterEncodingFilter, CommonsRequestLoggingFilter, ConfigurationClassPostProcessor, CorsFilter, DelegatingFilterProxy, DispatcherServlet, FormContentFilter, ForwardedHeaderFilter, FrameworkServlet, GenericFilterBean, HiddenHttpMethodFilter, HttpPutFormContentFilter, HttpServletBean, MBeanExportConfiguration, MultipartFilter, OncePerRequestFilter, OpenEntityManagerInViewFilter, OpenSessionInViewFilter, PropertySourcesPlaceholderConfigurer, RelativeRedirectFilter, RequestContextFilter, ResourceUrlEncodingFilter, ServletContextRequestLoggingFilter, ShallowEtagHeaderFilter

    public interface EnvironmentAware
extends Aware
    Interface to be implemented by any bean that wishes to be notified of the Environment that it runs in.
    从以下版本开始:
    3.1
    作者:
    Chris Beams
    另请参阅:
    EnvironmentCapable

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void setEnvironment(Environment environment)
      Set the Environment that this component runs in.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setEnvironment

        void setEnvironment(Environment environment)
        Set the Environment that this component runs in.
